summary: Build a static Valentine's Day themed single-page website using the provided HTML/CSS/JS template (popups, animations, timer, interactive buttons, secret password).
architectural_notes: Site is a static single-page HTML with embedded CSS and vanilla JavaScript for interactivity (no backend required).

existing_features.title: Implement a single-page React (TypeScript) site that recreates the provided HTML structure and content as a SPA page, including: floating hearts background layer, header with title/subtitle and clickable heart, a container with the same sequence of cards/sections, the quote block, and footer.

Recreate the original styling using Tailwind CSS (and small custom CSS only when necessary for keyframe animations), including: pink gradient background, card glass effect (blur), hover scale on cards, button styling/hover behavior, and typography scale similar to the template.

Implement the interactive behaviors from the provided JavaScript in React state/effects: (1) heart burst effect when the header heart is clicked, (2) love letter popup open/close, (3) reasons generator that shows a random reason from the provided list, (4) relationship timer that updates every second from the provided start date ("2022-08-01"), (5) “NO” button moves to a random position on hover, (6) “YES” button shows a celebratory confirmation and triggers heart burst, (7) secret password input that unlocks a secret popup when the password matches "bubu" (case-insensitive) and shows an error otherwise.

Convert any non-English (Hindi) user-facing text from the provided template into natural English while preserving the romantic meaning and structure, including both popup messages (Love Letter and Secret Message).

Create and apply a consistent visual theme direction (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that fits a Valentine’s Day romantic card-based landing page, keeping the provided pink palette as the primary direction and applying it consistently across all sections.
